document.full_text: bank robberies in the united states take place most often in mid-morning, on fridays and in southern and western states, according to government statistics released on tuesday.
document.title: friday is most popular day for bank robberies, fbi says
lines_and_colors: bank robberies in the united states take place most often in mid-morning, on fridays and in southern and western states, according to government statistics released on tuesday.
